library(EMC2)

## Design specification

Specify how model parameters map to experimental conditions using linear model formulas. The design function creates a design object that specifies:

• The model type (e.g., DDM)

• Linear models for estimated parameter types (omitted types are set to default values)

• Parameters to fix as constants (optional)

• Functions to create custom factors (optional)

• Custom contrast coding for factors (optional)
